column2: Includes accurate plot summaries, which are also balanced with appropriate amount of description and analysis.
column3: Includes some plot summaries, but not necessarily enough to contextualize the analysis, which makes the analysis a little disorienting.
column4: Not enough plot summaries to contextualize the analysis.

column2: Includes appropriate film terminologies to accurately describe cinematic details.
column3: Includes some film terminologies to describe cinematic details, but they might be either inaccurate or redundant.
column4: Not enough descriptions. May be a result of too much plot summary.

column2: Includes an in-depth analysis based on concrete evidence and sound logic. Interpretations are convincing and nuanced.
column3: Includes some convincing analysis, but there might be occasionally logic gaps between evidence and analysis.
column4: Not enough analysis. Claims are made without much development.

column2: Clearly presents a main idea and supports it throughout the paper.
column3: There is a main idea supported throughout most of the paper.
column4: Vague sense of a main idea, weakly supported throughout the paper.

column2: Well-planned and well-thought out. Includes title, introduction, statement of main idea, transitions and conclusion.
column3: Good overall organization, includes the main organizational tools.
column4: There is a sense of organization, although some of the organizational tools are used weakly or missing

column2: All paragraphs have clear ideas, are supported with examples and have smooth transitions.
column3: Most paragraphs have clear ideas, are supported with some examples and have transitions.
column4: Some paragraphs have clear ideas, support from examples may be missing and transitions are weak.

column2: Exceptionally well presented and argued; ideas are detailed, welldeveloped, supported with specific evidence & facts, as well as examples and specific details.
column3: Well-presented and argued; ideas are detailed, developed and supported with evidence and details, mostly specific.
column4: Content is sound and solid; ideas are present but not particularly developed or supported; some evidence, but usually of a generalized nature.

column2: Large amounts of specific examples and detailed descriptions.
column3: Some use of specific examples and detailed descriptions. May have extended examples that go on for too long.
column4: Little use of specific examples and details; mostly generalized examples and little description.

column2: Language is clear and concise. The word choice is strong and accurate.
column3: Language is sometimes unclear or redundant.

column2: Sentences are clear and varied in pattern (from simple to complex) with excellent use of punctuation.
column3: Sentences are clear but may lack variation; a few may be awkward and there may be a few punctuation errors.
column4: Sentences are generally clear but may have awkward structure or unclear content; there may be patterns of punctuation errors.

column2: Excellent grammar, spelling, syntax and punctuation.
column3: A few errors in grammar, spelling, syntax and punctuation, but not many.
column4: Shows a pattern of errors in spelling, grammar, syntax and/or punctuation. Could also be a sign of lack of proofreading.
